results.title: Comparative Effect of Lisinopril and Fosinopril in Mitigating Learning and Memory Deficit in Scopolamine-Induced Amnesic Rats

results.title: Defensive effect of natrium diethyldithiocarbamate trihydrate (NDDCT) and lisinopril in DOCA-salt hypertension-induced vascular dementia in rats.
results.text_hl: Treatments of NDDCT as well as @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ significantly attenuated @CHEMICAL_Desoxycorticosterone_Acetate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D064791 @@@DOCA@@@ @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Learning_Disabilities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007859 @@@impairment of learning and memory@@@, @DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@, and changes in various biochemical levels.

citations.NLM: Sharma B, Singh N. Defensive effect of natrium diethyldithiocarbamate trihydrate (NDDCT) and lisinopril in DOCA-salt hypertension-induced vascular dementia in rats. Psychopharmacology (Berl). 2012 Oct;223(3):307-17. PMID: 22526544
